verbs.description: [ARG0: sonnier] co - [V: produces] [ARG1: 1 8 million western] [ARGM-TMP: after mother father murdered] this is part two of a two - part series texas - born dallas sonnier working in the motion picture industry with partner jack heller felt verbally attacked not once but twice when he answered the phone each time one day apart in july 2010 and july 2012 he was informed one of his parents had been murdered you do n’t ever really recover from calls like that he said when his father was killed he already had given his word to help produce a client first film he became determined to fight through the pain sonnier whose legal name is joseph sonnier iv and heller both graduated from the university of southern california film school in los angeles dr joseph sonnier s craig zahler dallas sonnier lubbock texas father joseph sonnier iv sonnier
